static data::FileData::fileToArray ( $  filename,
$  limit = 0 
) [static]

Get two-dimensional array of file data

Parameters:
$filename [string] file name with full path
$limit if specified only return $limit records
Returns:
An array of arrays. Each inner array represents one line of data
